kickstart.post:
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance vm-container \ membership='VM Container' node='client' graph='default' public='yes'
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks set appliance attr vm-container kvm true
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance hosted-vm \ membership='Hosted VM' public='no'
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks set attr Xen_Dom0MinMem 768 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks set host bootflags flags="dom0_mem=1024M"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host attr localhost airboss localhost
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add bootaction action="install vm" \ kernel="notused" \ ramdisk="notused" \ args="ks ramdisk_size=1500000 lang= devfs=nomount kssendmac selinux=0 noipv6"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add bootaction action="install vm frontend" \ kernel="/boot/kickstart/default/vmlinuz-&rocks_version;-&arch;" \ ramdisk="/boot/kickstart/default/initrd.img-&rocks_version;-&arch;" \ args="ramdisk_size=150000 lang= devfs=nomount pxe kssendmac selinux=0 noipv6 ks=http://&Kickstart_PublicHostname;/install/sbin/kickstart.cgi ksdevice=eth1 build airboss=localhost"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add bootaction action="install frontend" kernel="vmlinuz-&rocks_version;-&arch;" ramdisk="initrd.img-&rocks_version;-&arch;" args="ramdisk_size=150000 lang= devfs=nomount pxe kssendmac selinux=0 noipv6 ks=http://&Kickstart_PublicHostname;/install/sbin/kickstart.cgi ksdevice=eth1 build airboss=localhost"
